Server kami sedang mengalami gangguan.
Tapi jangan khawatir, teknisi kami sedang memperbaikinya.

listings.not_enough_credits_description_: To increase these listings rankings and extend their expiry dates, {amount} more Ad Credits is needed to complete the action!
You can contact your dedicated Account Manager to purchase Ad Credits.

listings.partial_success_warning_descrip: Below you'll see the errors encountered by each of the listings.​We're sorry for this experience and want to help! You can contact us at:
listings.repost_failure_10002_descriptio: There are insufficient Ad Credits to complete Repost on this listing. For more Ad Credits, please contact your Account Manager.
listings.repost_failure_10003_descriptio: Your account has insufficient Ad Credits to complete Repost on this listing. Contact your Account Manager now for help!
listings.repost_failure_10004_descriptio: Sorry, this listing encountered a technical error and we were unable to refund your Ad Credits. Please contact us at {phone}.
listings.repost_failure_10006_descriptio: Oops, you already did a Repost on this listing earlier. If you'd like to Repost it, please try again later.

listings.repost_failure_10007_title_mult: Repost fails due to cannot consume credits ({amount} Listings)
listings.repost_failure_10007_descriptio: Oh no, there was a technical error and we were unable to complete your Repost. No Ad Credits have been deducted. Please try again later.
listings.repost_failure_10011_title_sing: Listing is commercial but agent has no commercial access ({amount} Listing)
listings.repost_failure_10011_title_mult: Listing is commercial but agent has no commercial access ({amount} Listings)

listings.drag_and_drop_tip_description1: To select a photo/video, press and hold onto it for 2 seconds. Then, drag and drop the selected item to reflect the desired order. Repeat these steps to arrange more photos/videos.

ad_product.turbo-warn-description1: This action disables your currently active {adproduct}, and starts the Turbo activation process.
ad_product.turbo-warn-description2:
Activating Turbo now will give you
 1. More visibility and priority. 
 2. Enhanced listing design on search results. 
 3. Performance Monitoring.
ad_product.turbo-warn-description2-1: Top-ranking spot above Boost and regular listings
ad_product.turbo-warn-description2-2: Extra Large desktop image carousel and cover photo
ad_product.turbo-warn-description2-3: WhatsApp button on search results and ads-free listing details page to increase chances of enquiries

edit_listings.photo_tips_description_1: Sebuah gambar bernilai 1000 kata! Listing dengan gambar properti yang tajam, terang, dan buram memiliki kinerja dan hasil terbaik.
edit_listings.photo_tips_description_2: Pasang gambar bersih tanpa teks atau tambahan lain, sertakan foto yang mendeskripsikan properti.

edit_listing_summary.title: SKOR KUALITAS
edit_listing_summary.detail: Rumah menggunakan skor untuk menilai kualitas listing yang anda miliki. Skor ini berdasarkan kelengkapan detail iklan anda. Semakin lengkap skor kualitas iklan anda, semakin tinggi kesempatan iklan anda muncul pada posisi teratas di halaman hasil pencarian.

edit_listing.well_done_detail: Skor kualitas iklan anda saat ini adalah 100%. Lanjutkan dan aktifkan iklan anda!
summary.currently.credit_equal_zero: Saat ini, Anda tidak memiliki kredit apa pun
onboarding.description_1: Periksa aksi tertunda, pengumuman, dan pesan belum terbaca ketika Anda berpergian.
onboarding.description_2: Post listing baru, urutkan/ filter dan edit mereka di mana saja dan kapan saja Anda butuhkan
onboarding.description_3: Pahami bagaimana listing Anda bekerja di mana saja dan kapan saja
onboarding.title_4: Repost atau Spotlight Sundul Listing Anda
onboarding.description_4: Berikan dorongan yang tepat pada listing Anda hanya dalam beberapa langkah
turbo.onboarding.description_1: Perkuat eksposur listing Anda hingga 8X dengan gambar ekstra besar dan posisi unggul terdepan!
turbo.onboarding.description_2: Amankan eksposur lebih banyak dengan listing Turbo Sundul Anda yang diprioritaskan di atas listing Spotlight Sundul dan reguler.​
turbo.onboarding.description_3: Gambar karosel dan sampul foto komputer ekstra besar untuk tampil lebih terlihat.
turbo.onboarding.description_4: Tambahan tombol WhatsApp di laman pencarian, foto profil, dan Berita Utama. Ditambah laman listing bebas-iklan.

promote_listing.faq.general.1.question: How do I promote a listing?
promote_listing.faq.general.1.answer:
● Go to AgentNet > My Listings. Choose the listing you intend to promote and click on the “Promote” icon
● Follow the onscreen instructions, and set your priority, daily budget, and campaign length.
● Review the number of estimated appearances that your audience will be shown a day, and click on “next”
● Keep an eye on how your Promoted Listing is doing on the performance page
● Track the impressions and progress of your Promoted listings campaign through promoted listing performance report.
promote_listing.faq.general.2.question: What does “Priority” mean?
promote_listing.faq.general.2.answer: Priority determines how likely your campaign will be successful, as well as how high your Promoted Listing is shown in the search results – the higher your priority, the more likely that your Promoted Listing appears near the top of the page, above other Promoted Listings running in the same category. This therefore could help to increase the views and speed of transactions. Priority will also determine how much you pay per 1,000 appearances in search.
promote_listing.faq.general.3.question: What does setting a “daily budget” do?
promote_listing.faq.general.3.answer:
As Promoted Listings is a pay-as-you-go tool, the number of Prime Credits that is required is quoted per 1000 appearances.

The daily budget helps you control your costs - as it lets you set the maximum number of Prime Credits that you can pay a day.

This affects the number of appearances that your listing gets a day.
promote_listing.faq.general.4.question: How will I be charged for Promoted Listings?
promote_listing.faq.general.4.answer:
You will be charged based on the priority you set, as well as the number of appearances that your listing has gotten.

For example:

You set your priority to “high”, and are quoted 2 Prime Credits per 1000 appearances.

You set your daily budget to 1 Prime Credit a day.

Therefore your listing will see a maximum of 500 appearances in a day.

On day 1, your listing sees 500 appearances. As such, you will be charged 1 Prime Credit for the day.

On day 2, your listing sees 250 appearances. As such, you will only be charged 0.5 Prime Credits for the day.

You are only charged for the appearances that your Promoted Listing gets.
promote_listing.faq.general.5.question: Can I view the performance report immediately?
promote_listing.faq.general.5.answer: You can view your performance report at any time on Agentnet, however, the report has a 2-hour delay for appearances in search data and a 2-day delay in listing views & leads data. As such, you will be able to view your campaign performance 2 hours after the start of the Promoted Listing. You can also check on the performance of completed or stopped Promoted Listings on the report.
